item.title: Teresa add a quote by Anita Diamant
item.description: "I am so honored to be the vessel into which you pour this story of pain and strength." -- Anita Diamant

item.title: Teresa add a quote by Tosca Lee
item.description: "How mighty, how great the One must be, I thought, to send the heavens careening, and yet hear the cry of a single heart." -- Tosca Lee

item.title: Teresa add a quote by Mary Doria Russell
